text: Nabiyoow! Marka ay dumar muâ€™minooyin ah kuu yimaadaan si ay kuula galaan ballan inaysan u shariiik yeeli doonin waxba la jirka Allaah, inaysan wax xadi doonin, oo zineysan doonin, oo aysan dili doonin carruurtooda, oo la iman doonin masabbid ay iyagu naf ahaantoodu ku been abuurteen gacmahooda iyo addimadooda7, oo kugu diidi doonin wixii wanaag ah aad amarto, markaa aqbal ballankooda, oo uga bari Allaah inuu u dambi dhaafo. Hubaal Allaah waa Dambi Dhaaf Badane, Naxariis badan
